form.title: Set allowed algorithms
form.description: Only the algorithms selected here will be allowed to run on your dataset. Uncheck all to remove any access to your dataset.

data.name: publisherTrustedAlgorithms
data.label: Selected Algorithms
data.help: Choose one or multiple algorithms you trust to allow them to run on this dataset.

data.name: allowAllPublishedAlgorithms
data.label: All Algorithms
data.help: Allow any published algorithm to run on this dataset.
